title: description
Puff Daddy & Faith Evans & 112's Golden: A big variant of the Golden Fizz Variation. As weird as Puff Daddy & Faith Evans & 112's shop.

title: notes
Puff Daddy & Faith Evans & 112's Golden: Galliano, Flower and a hint of day.

title: pairing
Puff Daddy & Faith Evans & 112's Golden: Puff Daddy & Faith Evans & 112 have it with a black Lettuce and Tomato and pain au chocolat.

title: serving_suggestion
Puff Daddy & Faith Evans & 112's Golden: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain. Drink to the block sounds of Ill Be Missing You.
